product_name: GORE RideOn Brake Cable Kit - Sealed Low Friction System
long_description: GORE RideOn brake cable kit (Sealed Low Friction System) is Ideal for mountain and cyclocross bikes. This patented cable coating technology is designed for low friction and durability.
short_description: GORE RideOn brake cable kit (Sealed Low Friction System) is Ideal for mountain and cyclocross bikes. This patented cable coating technology is designed for low friction and durability.
